title: I'm Back and with Lots to Say, Sept 9th 2016
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. I'm back and with lots to say, is my opportunity to return to the waves with commentary and insight in to the things that have become commonplace. Segregation, flag burning, insults, these are now the matters of the day, but now the shoe is on the other foot. Join me as I explore issues that have returned to haunt us. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show & our new home on Redstatetalkradio.com Support the podcast, use the next level of autonomy, cryptocurrency: BTC: Azen7A8rsEwQ84SCB3ZsbuYALpNCGgqNc
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
